local_intent: Lower onto the white_plate until contact is detected (verify contact) and confirm contact.
assumptions: White plate is within sensor view and reachable
Gripper is open and ready for contact
coherence_with_global: Implements the verify-phase lowering step from the global plan: perceives the white_plate, moves above, aligns, lowers until contact, and verifies contact consistent with the task description and safety/timeouts.
